title: Richbased
author: Richbased
content: Though similar threads of this nature have been created here before but it is important we revisit it as the threads were created a long time ago.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1626904.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1595920.0Due to some incessant behaviours of gamblers whenever they lose a bet made me bring up this topic like why will someone lose a bet and transfer the aggression to other people around them? It is necessary for us to know that gambling is a game of chance as you may either win or lose and should be played for fun and not to go too extreme on others whenever you've lost a bet. I see some persons transferring this aggression on their families or loved ones whenever they lose a bet like they will either be very violent on their wives or their children to the extent that any little misunderstanding they take it as provocation. Any one who chose to play gamble should be able and matured enough to handle their emotions whether they win or lose bets.Please let's share our thoughts on this topic
